subject: This Week on CBS SportsLine.com: Coronation for a King?
body:
This Week on CBS SportsLine - a weekly programming guide





 






 



June 4-June 10, 2007






 
 
 
 







 



This programming guide is updated throughout the week. Click here to see the latest version






 


 


 



Coronation for a King?
Coronation for a King? LeBron James will be looking to make some noise in his first Finals. (AP)


    

      
      The legend is growing, but titles measure greatness. LeBron James' 
      Cavaliers want their first, but waiting in the NBA Finals starting 
      Thursday are the veteran Spurs. Tony Mejia and Mike Freeman 
      will be there. • Matchup 
      | Schedule 
      | Bracket 
      | Expert 
      picks | Cavaliers 
      | Spurs
 






 

 





 This week: Stanley Cup Finals roll on


    

      
      After losing two in Anaheim, Ottawa and Daniel Alfredsson (pictured) get 
      back in it by winning Saturday. The Ducks will be without 
      suspended Chris Pronger for Monday's Game 4. Wes Goldstein 
      reports.
    

  
• Matchup | Expert picks | Bracket | Ducks | Senators  

 




U P C O M I N G  V I D E O



Daily

 
NHL highlights
Stanley Cup Finals highlights and off-day interviews ... just look for "CBS SportsLine highlights."
Sports Update
What's happening in sports? Jason Horowitz and Amber Wilson have the lowdown on the showdowns.







ThursdayJune 7

 
Fantasy Baseball
Amber Wilson and David Gonos help you plan your lineup for the upcoming week.
Baseball
Senior writer Scott Miller chats with Amber Wilson about his latest Hot Topic in MLB.








FridayJune 8

 
Fantasy Football Show
Keep up with your fellow owners in the offseason with Dave Richard and Jamey Eisenberg, every week. 








Complete video schedule for the week 





 


 





U P C O M I N G  S C H E D U L E



MondayJune 4

 
Auto Racing
After a rainout Sunday, it's Monday afternoon racing from Dover, Del.
Mike Freeman
It's his turn, and you'll learn about Kelly Sutton, who races NASCAR trucks while living with MS.








TuesdayJune 5

 
College Football
Dennis Dodd tells of Joe McKnight, who has an entire state mad at him after leaving Louisiana to go to USC.
NFL
Pete Prisco looks in on Vernand Morency, the Packers' new No. 1 running back.
Baseball
Scott Miller says the Dodgers' Russell Martin is the best catcher few have heard of.








WednesdayJune 6

 
SPiN on Sports
Clay Travis explains what 'flugtag' is and why he'll take the plunge; Eric Kay and Johnny Rosenstein engage in Bar Room Banter.
Fantasy Football
Jamey Eisenberg features RB Chester Taylor, who now has company in the Vikings backfield. 










ThursdayJune 7

 
Gregg Doyel
It's his turn, and yours, too, in Hate Mail.








SaturdayJune 9

 
Tennis
Who's the top woman on clay? Find out in the French Open singles final from Paris.
Fantasy Baseball
David Gonos' Hitting Planner for Week 11.








SundayJune 10

 
Tennis
Play at Roland Garros concludes with the men's singles final.
Fantasy Baseball
Get your lineup set early -- don't miss Eric Mack's Pitching Planner.







Next Week

 
Golf
The season's second major, the U.S. Open, at Oakmont Country Club in Pennsylvania.






 




K E Y   D A T E S



July 19

 
Golf
Tiger Woods begins defense of his British Open title at Carnoustie.







July 29

 
Auto Racing
NASCAR goes to Indianapolis for 400 miles at the Brickyard.







Aug. 5

 
NFL
Pro Football Hall of Fame Game, New Orleans vs. Pittsburgh.
